name: Uber Mario Tarp
description:
UBER MARIO TARP is the world first tarpformer!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Play as Uber Mario, and collect all 150 Power Tarps to SAVE THE TARP DIMESNION!!!1!

UBER MARIO wants to collect ALL 150 POWER TARPS!
BUT HE NEEDS YOUR HELP TO DO IT!!!!
Enjoy the fastenating action in this Uber Mario game!
Press left arrow, right arrow, to move,
A to fasten, and T to get the trailer movin!

Featuring:

-150 collectible Power Tarps

-Infinity graphics

-Uber Mario

-Realistic Tarp Physics

-Fully voiced soundtrack

-Pre-rendered cutscenes
